title: 107_hr1400
content: Prescription Drug Fairness for Seniors Act of 2001 - Requires each participating manufacturer of a covered outpatient drug to make it available for purchase by each pharmacy: (1) in an amount equal to the aggregate amount sold or distributed by the pharmacy to Medicare beneficiaries. And (2) at a price no greater than the manufacturer's average foreign price. Sets forth special provisions with respect to hospice programs.
